Registry FAQ's

F A Q s

Once you have decided to register for your own custom pieces of Marie Daage tableware and accessories, a custom registry will be set up within five (5) days of your selections and in just a few clicks, your guests can make purchases on your behalf.  With one link, share it with ease to your friends and family with the privacy settings of your choosing.  Sassafras Designs believes that oftentimes, guests prefer to select gifts after the wedding or purchase additional pieces for the couple’s first wedding anniversary.  The registry will remain up and running up to and including your first wedding anniversary. Of course, Sassafras Designs will always have a record of what you have chosen and can produce more pieces at any time. 

Contact Sassafras Designs with any changes or additional pieces you may want to add or change from your registry. 

Every time a gift is purchased for you, we will send you an email record of the purchase. The email will feature the item or items that have been selected for you and will also include a personal message from the gift giver.  Sassafras Designs will also keep a running inventory of what has been purchased and what remains to be purchased from your selections for up to and including your first wedding anniversary.

Pieces are ordered immediately upon purchase through the Registry.  Unfortunately, due to the custom nature of Marie Daage tableware and accessories, production requires a 12 week lead time.  If there is sufficient time from the time of ordering, the ordered pieces by a specific guest can be sent directly to them at their request so that they can be presented to you in person. 

Day or night, your guests will be able to shop any time on your registry at Sassafrasdesigns.com.

Absolutely. You will be able to view all the gifts that have been purchased alongside the names of the purchasers.

Each registry purchase has a shipping fee applied to it, that way when it is time to receive your gifts, shipping and any related customs duty is all taken care of.

Sassafras Designs takes special care to work with prospective brides and grooms to ensure that the pieces they select are exactly what they want.  Therefore, due to the custom nature of Marie Daage tableware and accessories, returns and exchanges cannot be accepted.
